plays.text: Penalty to P.J. Stock 2 minutes for Interference Scott Nichol
Penalty to Marc Savard 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick Bryan Berard
Goal scored by Glen Murray assisted by Joe Thornton and Sergei Samsonov
Penalty to Ivan Huml 2 minutes for Tripping Petr Buzek
Penalty to Nick Boynton 2 minutes for Hooking Craig Conroy
Goal scored by Toni Lydman assisted by Jarome Iginla and Chris Drury

Goal scored by Chuck Kobasew assisted by Marc Savard and Robyn Regehr
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Tripping Marty McInnis
Goal scored by Jonathan Girard assisted by Glen Murray and Joe Thornton
Penalty to Bob Boughner 2 minutes for Interference P.J. Axelsson
Penalty to Brian Rolston 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Marc Savard
Goal scored by Bryan Berard assisted by Sergei Samsonov and Joe Thornton
Goal scored by Chris Clark unassisted
Penalty to Sean O'Donnell 2 minutes for Boarding Chris Drury
Penalty to Sean Brown 2 minutes for Crosschecking Petr Buzek
